# WEAPON::IS_PED_WEAPON_COMPONENT_ACTIVE

## Summary
Return if character weapon component is active, make sure it's a valid weapon component first with HAS_PED_GOT_WEAPON_COMPONENT.

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** pedIndex
* **WEAPON_TYPE** typeOfWeapon
* **WEAPONCOMPONENT_TYPE** typeOfComponent

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Full list of weapons & components by DurtyFree: https://github.com/DurtyFree/gta-v-data-dumps/blob/master/weapons.json
